title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Social Media                Social Media       Stay connected with what is happening at Cape Lookout National Seashore through our social media pages. Learn about the park before your visit, keep up to date on park events, and share your experiences. Learn more below.  Â    Facebook Cape Lookout National Seashore has an official Facebook page. Here, you can share your experiences in the park. We'll share the latest park news, post photos and videos, and highlight current conditions when possible. Twitter Follow @CapeLookoutNPS to recieve breaking news, severe weather warnings, closure updates, special event announcements, and other information.
